name: Phoenix Fall
description:
Solo developed game for the Blackthornprod jam #3. All assets made by me in the week of the jam. 

The fewer platforms you land on, the more flight time! Try to reach the fire at the bottom of the procedurally generated levels in as few lands as possible! Why land? To refuel your flight time!

Controls

-On platform: S to look down A,W or D to take off

-Flight: AD to move. S Dive. Tap opposite direction to flap (eg hold A and press D and   vice versa)

Font by LetterStuff Type.
